fields.name: Top-level Category 1
fields.description: This is the category with the mostest, first and foremostest, head of the pack, first in the lead.

fields.name: Top-level Category 2
fields.description: Only second by a smidge, this category is playing 2nd fiddle to only one!  You gotta love 2, the loneliest number since the number 1

fields.name: Sub-category A
fields.description: Sub is such a sub-standard word to describe a category like this one.  It is sublime.

fields.name: Sub-category B
fields.description: To B or not to B, that is the question, tho questionable as it may B.

fields.name: Sub-category C
fields.description: YASC  (yet another sub-cateogry), but with a twist - this one's parent is the number 2

fields.name: Sub-sub Category i
fields.description: This is getting a little crazy - I mean do you really need a 3-level hierarchy?  Are you sure?
